body.name: GPS Navigation for Car,Truck 2024 Maps Vehicle GPS Navigation 9 Inch Touch Screen Voice Car GPS for Lorry Speeding Warning Free Lifetime Maps Update of United States Canada Mexico
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 56 mins
features: 🚗【Free Lifetime Map Updates】the Latest 2024 North American Maps Are Pre-installed (pre-installed: Us, Canada, Mexico), if You Need Maps of Other Countries Please Contact Us Through Amazon (downloadable but Not Pre-installed Maps: Europe, South America, Etc.)

🚗【9 inch Vehicle GPS Navigation for Car】9 inch Vehicle GPS Navigation for Car high-accuracy, endurable large touch-screen reacts fast with no delay,800 x 480 resolution. The preinstall map of North America, including Mexico and Canada, is the most up-to-date 2023maps offering 30 languages.8GB ROM , surpport 32G SD Card(external)plenty of room for you to storage other regions' maps in case you go on inter-continent trips.

🚗【9 inch Sat Nav with Sunshade】: navigation with a large display helps you find everything super well, especially suitable for professional truck drivers and older people. The suction cup with the base holds the navigation very firmly despite the size. Thanks to the free self-adhesive 3M holder, the navigation system can also be attached to the dashboard.

🚗【REAL VOICE NAVIGATION】: Choose from a selection of voices that will provide you turn by turn voice navigation. Real man or woman voice broadcast you don’t have to look on the GPS screen all the time. It makes your driving safer, reduce fatigue driving, away from the ticket. Other Security Alert Types: Average Speed Camera, Red Light Camera ,Railway Crossing, High Accident Zone,City Entry Piont, Dangerous Area.

🚗【After-Sales Service】We Offer You 100% Satisfaction 30 Days Hassle Free Money Back Guarantee, And Lifetime Warranty. If You Have Any Questions About The Product, Please Contact Us Via Amazon Message. We Will Reply You In 24 Hours.
body.description: Select the Professional High-quality GPS Navigation for your love car, You just not only select the perfect product ,but also best serviceTeam will offer the best support for you. Just Enjoy Your DrivingOTHER IMPORTANT FUNCTION OF GPS NAVIGATION❶Support Postcode, Address, Coordinates and POI Search (Please refer to User Manual for details of using postcode search);❷Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time;❸Various Route Planning: Fast, Green, Economical and Easy;❹Provide real voice broadcast with over 40 languages❺Provide 7 vehicle modes betwe;❻With Latest GPS Chipset, Excellent in receiving signal, fast and accurate position fixing, provides you the satisfied navigating service❼Entertainment: MP3 and MP4 function can relieve your fatigueKINDLY REMINDER1.To avoid damage due to current surge, plug in the car charger after the automobile is started.2.To make sure the navigator always on, please keep chargingthe navigator during use it.Package List:1 x 9" Touch Screen GPS Navigation1 x Car Charger1 x USB cable1 x User Manual1 x Back Bracket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good screen - large and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst device I have ever seen
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this horrible device. After sampling it. I knew I made a huge mistake. I tried to get directions to a store five minutes from my house and it couldn’t give accurate directions. Not to mention numerous other times I have tried finding locations smh. None were accurate. Awful, horrible device. I still can’t program it after all this time. Resetting does not work. I can’t change it to English. Will make sure I look at what I purchase. I wish I could get my money back!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Find your way.
reviews.reviewText: This GPS 8s easy to install and comes with everything needed. It is easily mounted to the windshield of any type of vehicle. Its accuracy is point on and has a good clear voice that let's you know what move you are to make next. Its bright screen ensures you can always tell where you're turning. This is a very state of the art GPS system at a fraction of the cost of the more expensive name brand ones. Great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad but I just wanted a GPS
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a great unit for the price. It has MANY features above and beyond a mere GPS. However:1 - The instruction booklet that came with does not provide instructions for anything beyond unboxing and installation. There are so many features in this unit that I have no idea how to use.2 - The 7" display is nice but it's high gloss so, even with the sunshade (great idea) in place, the glare from reflection makes the display difficult to see in bright light, even with the brightness at 100%.3 - Most of the additional functionality requires a SIM card which means an additional "phone line" charge on your cell bill and likely LOTS of data usage.Overall it's not a bad GPS but, for the price, is better as a tablet with all the extra built-in stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard for to set , sent it back
reviews.reviewText: Had a hard time getting the correct time zone set.Returned the unit .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars most important to know is that it is useless
reviews.reviewText: i bought this as a gift for my brother. he couldn't figure it out so recently he brought it to me on a visit. we are both intelligent people but i could NOT figure it out. i have a gps that i've used for years which has been a lifesaver so i wished the same for him. MOST of the intructions are in a language other than english and i could not even do the simplest tasks like put in an address. too late to return so a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Functional, but not the best user interface
reviews.reviewText: I really wish I'd gone with a better known brand. This does work. It lets you know if you're speeding, which I LOVE, but the user interface is very clunky and it can be annoying to navigate the navigation device.Weirdly, it is like a tablet and it has things like games on it as well as navigation, which is confusing. I guess that would be nice if you had little ones to entertain in the car, but then kids normally have electronics already. Seems like a really strange choice to leave games on this thing.I came back to dock some stars because it recently let me in circles, then proceeded to completely stop navigating later in the day, and lead me way past my house. Thankfully it led me in a direction that I recognized. But be careful with this thing…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
